Text: When the site's welcome page mentions UFO's, Atlantis, astral projection and the "real meaning" of the Giza pyramids you can be pretty confident that this is NOT science. Load of "alternative" rubbish.

They specifically ask that you to NOT BELIEVE anything they talk about without looking into things on your own. Sure, some of the ideas may seem odd, but that doesn't mean that there is nothing to gain from watching these videos. They are simply transmitting ideas with scientific evidence.
